name: The witch and the dragon
description:
My submission for Waifu Jam 2016.

In this tiny turn-based game, you're faced with the task of defeating a dragon. Cast your spells by hitting the magic targets (press SPACE) and take down the powerful monster!

I learned a lot while making this game but I'm afraid the end result will be pretty boring to play. Sorry about that.

If you find anything not working as it should please let me know.

The great music you'll here was composed by Jasozz. All my thanks go to him.
